name: Silent Yoga
whatInside: Includes calming poses for nervous system reset.
Access on any device at your pace.
benefits: Ideal for introverts or overstimulated minds
description1: Silent Yoga blends physical postures with complete silence for a deeply inward experience. No music, no talking — just mindful breath and movement. This session combines mindful movement with expert guidance to help you reconnect with your body and mind. Whether you're a beginner or experienced, it offers clarity, structure, and personal space for growth.
description2: It’s perfect for creating inner stillness, especially for those needing a tech-free mental break. You'll leave this class feeling more grounded, energized, and aligned — ready to bring calm focus into your daily life.

name: Blissfull Yoga
whatInside: Full-Body Stretch, Morning Energy Boost, or Deep Sleep Yoga.
25 minutes – perfect for daily practice or mid-day resets.
A brief intro or photo of the teacher to build trust and familiarity.
Get lifetime access in your dashboard — anytime, on any device.
benefits: Reduces stress and anxiety through deep relaxation
Enhances sleep quality and mental clarity
Loosens tight muscles with gentle stretches
description1: Each yoga session is designed to target specific goals — whether it’s stress relief, flexibility, core strength, or deep relaxation. Whether you're a beginner or experienced, it offers clarity, structure, and personal space for growth.
